EmailTemplate.subject: Don’t let this deal take off without you
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
As a valued Honeywell customer, we wanted to share some exciting news with you! Honeywell Aerospace Trading is selling 737NG 4091900-942 Digital Display Units for only $36,000 on GoDirect Trade!
There are only limited units for sale, so act fast! To avail this offer you must be a GoDirect Trade member. Register for free on GoDirect Trade, if you haven’t already.
If you have any checkout issues, please do not hesitate to email support@godirecttrade.com <[[mailto:support@godirecttrade.com]]> or call us at 1-833-294-9943 for immediate help. CHECK IT OUT <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/promotion.html]]> Stay healthy, stay safe, and take care,
Timi Reed-Jeske Sales Leader Honeywell Aerospace Trading
